title: Seoul Day 3 - Drupal Tour 2016
body:
Yesterday, Seoul was cooler than the day before, So, we decided to start our day late and look for a brunch in Bukchon Hanok Village and ancient neighbourhood in Seoul.



After wall inside this ancient place, we decided to continue with our tour in palaces visiting Changdeokgung Palace and Unhyeongung Royal Residence.



At the end of the noon, we walk across Insa-dong street and drunk coffee.

At night, we move to another area of Seoul to participate in a meetup of Korean Drupal user group to talk about Drupal Console project.

They surprise me because Yeongtaek Hong share a new translation of Drupal Console project to the Korean Language, and Kim another member of the community print two banner one about the meetup and one about my tour.





Walking

Distance (steps)
Seoul (today) 13.537
Previously 301.975
Total 315.512
